channel.title: S4/HANA News Feed
channel.description: Latest updates from the S4/HANA News Team

item.title: Training and Troubleshooting Services
item.description: Need help troubleshooting a transaction or have a question? Submit a ticket in Solution Manager under the Training Support service category and a Training Officer will answer your ticket as soon as possible!

item.title: Improvements to the GAC approval process
item.description: üì£‚ÄãThe CAG dashboard has just been updated! Key features include better alignment of workflows and approvals with Section 34 requirements, the reject feature returning transactions to AP coders for correction, the removal of the "Edit GCC" option, and much more. This update will be available on December 15. To learn more about the latest enhancements, check out our overview and the SAP Coffee Break Recording.
